metadata.title: CVE-2017-16641 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
lib/rrd.php in Cacti 1.1.27 allows remote authenticated administrators to execute arbitrary OS commands via the path_rrdtool parameter in an action=save request to settings.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-16641` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.1.38+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.38+ds1-1').
